thread.title_full: OCR Fines Cancer Care Group $750K for Potential HIPAA Security Violations

title: OCR Fines Cancer Care Group $750K for Potential HIPAA Security Violations
text:
04 OCR Fines Cancer Care Group $750K for Potential HIPAA Security Violations 
Healthcare Informatics: An Indiana-based radiation oncology practice, Cancer Care Group, P.C., agreed to pay $750,000 in potential violations of the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) Privacy and Security Rules stemming from a 2012 data breach.
